directions: Blend marionberries, hemp milk, kale, banana, ice, cashew butter, chia seeds, honey, and orange blossom water together in a blender until smooth.
ingredients: ½ cup hemp milk, or more to taste
¼ cup chopped kale, or to taste
1 tablespoon cashew butter, or more to taste
1 teaspoon honey, or more to taste
title: Mal's Killer Vegan PB-and-J Smoothie
